message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $100. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and the benefits it provides. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer at $90.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $95 for the product. I believe this is a mutually beneficial price considering the value it offers.
